Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Harlem (FP). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Harlem (FP).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near 100th/Paxton
ShortDescription: J14 buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Torrence, 100th, Yates, 95th, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near 100th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Torrence, 100th, Yates, 95th, and Jeffery, due to street blockage near 100th/Paxton.

Allow extra travel time.
